transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello good morning.
Customer: Yes sir good morning.
Customer: Sir ek lead mere ko dikhi thi IndiaMART pe koi us mera app update nahi tha.
Executive: Achcha theek hai. 
Customer: To jaise hi maine use maine use contact kiya jaise hi to wo gayab ho gaya matlab wo fir se mujhe wo us pe pahuncha hi nahi hai.
Executive: Ek second rukiye rukiye main khol raha hu theek hai. 
Executive: Company ka naam bataiye na aap 9696 pe call kiya hai kya?
Customer: Kya kare?
Executive: Aapna company ka naam bataiye aapne 9696 pe call kiya hai kya?
Customer: Ha, Shah Enterprise.
Executive: Achcha Shah Enterprise, ek second. Ji.

Executive: Phone pe open kiya aapne ya mobile pe?
Customer: Mobile pe.
Executive: Mobile pe. Mobile mobile app pe hai ji.
Customer: Mera app update up to date nahi tha koi update aaya hoga aaj kal mein. 
Executive: To jaise hi maine kholne ki koshish kari. 
Customer: Haan. 
Customer: To by lead gayab hi ho gayi na to consume hui hai. 
Executive: Aap actually bhi to nahi hai main kafi samay se aapko main call lagane ka koshish kar raha tha aap utha nahi rahe the I think aapne notice kiya hoga bahut sari calls ja rahi hai aapko hamari team se. 
Customer: Haan haan. 
Executive: Hai na? To aapka app update ho gaya matlab. 
Customer: Nahi wo to maine abhi kiya hai sirf aaj. 
Executive: Kya kare?
Executive: Aapka app update ho gaya matlab?
Customer: Haan app maine fir update kiya abhi. 
Executive: Yahi silica sand ka tha na 55 minute pehle yahi wali? 
Customer: Na. Nahi.
Customer: Bawal ke bawal karke jagah hai bawal ki location pe wo show ho raha tha aur charcoal ki requirement thi industrial purpose ke liye.
Executive: Location aapne bola bawal.
Customer: Bawal.

Executive: Main usko nahi maine. 
Customer: Nahi bawal to Haryana mein hai.
Executive: Haryana mein hai. Ji.
Executive: Bhiwani ka Haryana ka. 
Customer: Charcoal. 
Executive: Kya kare?
Customer: Haan bawal bawal bawal. 
Executive: Ruko Haryana ka nikalta hu. 
Executive: Bawal.

Executive: Aap us pe by lead pe click kijiyega. 
Customer: Ji.
Executive: By lead pe click kijiye. 
Customer: Kya karu?
Executive: Aapna application open kijiye IndiaMART ka. 
Customer: Ji ek minute.

Customer: Ji open open ho gaya. 
Executive: By lead pe click kijiyega. 
Customer: By lead pe hi hu. 
Executive: Right side mein dekhiyega teen dots honge upar mein top pe. Haan. Ji. 
Executive: Waha pe past lead dikh raha hai option ek? 
Customer: Kya karu? Past past lead ka koi option dikh raha hai past lead ya sold out lead koi ek option hota hai waha pe dekhiyega.

Customer: Nahi aisa to nahi hai. 
Executive: Aisa kuch nahi hai. Lead wale section mein na. 
Customer: Ha. Short lead hidden latest. 
Customer: Aur latest tender by by lead balance. 
Customer: Uske baad more ka option dikh raha hai more more dikh raha hai? 
Customer: Na isme nahi na. 
Executive: Achcha waha waha pe hatai wapas se by lead pe click kijiye aur us line mein dekhiye jaha pe wo likha hota hai na by type and all waha pe dekhiye hoga more options ka. Kya laptop se aap login karoge isko?
Customer: Laptop pe to nahi ho payega abhi. 
Executive: Abhi nahi ho payega? Nahi. 
Executive: Aur aap isme aa raha hai recent. 
Executive: Aur recent ke alawa. 
Customer: Catalog views related. Haan. 
Customer: Uske baad mein hai tenders past. 
Customer: Haan uske baad ek more ka option hoga dekhiyega. Past hai past hai. 
Customer: Haan past. Haan us pe click kijiye. Ji. 
Executive: Ji dekho to waha dikh raha wo lead jo jo sold out hua aapka. 
Customer: Waha pe dekhiye check kijiye dikh raha hai? Na. Na. Na. 
Executive: Kyunki agar sold out hua to fir to waha dikhega. Haan? Achcha. 
Executive: Agar agar sold out hui hai na to waha pe dikhta hai wo ya to fir wo delete kar diya hoga user ne hi wo lead hi delete kar diya. 
Customer: Haan user ne matlab by mistake kiya hoga to delete kar diya hoga. 
Executive: Aisa ho sakta hai. Haan. Kyunki jis time pe wo isme post kiya hoga wo notification aa gaya aur delete ka aayega hi nahi. To wahi main keh raha hu kyunki agar sold out hota to yaha dikhta matlab usne post hi nahi kiya that is delete kar diya inquiry. Haan. Achcha aapke catalog mein na aapke catalog mein bahut sare product aise hain jo ki inactive pade hain kuch. 
Customer: Haan wo inactive product hai. 
Executive: Achcha. Ha kar rakhe hai maine. Haan. To baad kabhi laoge future mein kabhi future mein laenge ya ya fir matlab hamesha hi inactive. Aap kar sakte hai kabhi kabhi aise rakhna hai pending mein. 
Executive: Pending mein hi rakhna hai isko? Haan. Matlab baad mein aap la sakte hain. Haan la sakte hain kabhi. Achcha aur aap mera number likh lijiye Raju Prajapati mera number likh lijiye kyunki main aapko kafi samay se call kar raha tha aap utha nahi rahe the matlab. Haan aata hai aata hai aapka call mere paas mein lekin main utha nahi raha tha jaan bujh ke. Achcha koi baat nahi aapne samay se uthaiyega but aapko jarurat pade to kyunki dekho aapke product ki price bhi galat hai industrial pyrood ka price kitna hai aapka? 
Customer: Kya likha hua hai? Kya hai?
Customer: 4500 per kg likha hua hai 4500 rupees per kg. 
Executive: Per ton likhna hai isko. Haan same hai? Per ton ton. Ton likhna hai na isko wahi to dekhiye unit hi galat hai. Ha bilkul. T o n. Ji kar dijiyega. Abhi correct ho gaya dekhiye ye. Theek hai. Aur aur dekhiye kyunki aapne 9696 pe call kiya hai to mere liye ek feedback jayega theek hai. To please satisfied mark kar dijiyega theek hai kyunki aapko koi concern to hai nahi hai na? Theek hai. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's app was not updated.

- A buylead disappeared after customer tried contacting.

- Product price is incorrect in the catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive checked for the missing buylead.

- Informed customer about inactive products in catalog.

- Executive guided to correct product price unit.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will update the product price unit.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, app update, product price, catalog
